enableSolutionCommentsModal.enableCommen:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for a modal to enable comments on a solution
**UI Location**: Enable Solution Comments Modal (header)
**When Users See This**: When a user clicks to enable comments on their solution
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Enable comments?"
enableSolutionCommentsModal.enablingComm:
**Functional Purpose**: Explanatory text about enabling comments
**UI Location**: Enable Solution Comments Modal (body paragraph)
**When Users See This**: When the Enable Solution Comments Modal is displayed
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Enabling comments allows people to publically post questions and thoughts on your solution. You can disable this at any time."
enableSolutionCommentsModal.enableCommen:
**Functional Purpose**: Action button to confirm enabling comments
**UI Location**: Enable Solution Comments Modal (action button)
**When Users See This**: When the Enable Solution Comments Modal is displayed, before clicking to confirm
**Technical Context**: Standard button text
**Current English**: "Enable comments"
enableSolutionCommentsModal.cancel:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to close the modal without enabling comments
**UI Location**: Enable Solution Comments Modal (cancel button)
**When Users See This**: When the Enable Solution Comments Modal is displayed
**Technical Context**: Standard button text
**Current English**: "Cancel"
enableSolutionCommentsModal.unableToEnab:
**Functional Purpose**: Error message when enabling comments fails
**UI Location**: Enable Solution Comments Modal (error message area)
**When Users See This**: If the request to enable comments fails
**Technical Context**: This string is used as a default error message if `DEFAULT_ERROR` is null or undefined.
**Current English**: "Unable to enable comments"
